entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
